Our customers’ businesses serve global digital needs. We know it is our
customer's priority to operate the most efficient systems. We therefore design our
systems to optimize technical advantages to achieve superior cost of ownership for
our customers. From the conception of each system, we aim for maximum
efficiency and minimal hazardous chemical, water and energy requirements. Our
design philosophy helps our customers achieve optimal production levels and their
sustainability goals. 
 
To reduce the overall environmental footprint of Veeco systems and also to
respond to market demands, we offer Veeco Certified Equipment. We help to
connect buyers and sellers of pre-owned Veeco systems via a dedicated
brokerage service (see below).

VEECO CERTIFIED EQUIPMENT (VCE)
Equipment is retrieved from a manufacturer that no longer requires it.
(Accepted systems: MOCVD, IBE, IBD, PVD and MBE).
Retrieved equipment is checked and tested for quality and
performance.
Obsolete components are replaced, software and control systems are
updated. 
Latest software package and free software upgrades provided. 
Veeco provides a 12-month warranty on VCE hardware and software.
New owners of VCE have access to a trained, worldwide service team.
